code: import{createEvent}from'effector/compat';import{fetchAccountAvatars,fetchAccountCoupons,fetchAccountInfo,fetchAccountPData,fetchAccountVerify,fetchUpdateAccount}from'./effects';export var accountPDataMount=createEvent();export var accountInfoMount=createEvent();export var getCurrentAccount=createEvent();export var updateAccountMount=createEvent();export var accountAvatarsMount=createEvent();export var accountCouponsMount=createEvent();export var accountVideoVerifyMount=createEvent();accountPDataMount.watch(fetchAccountPData);accountInfoMount.watch(fetchAccountInfo);updateAccountMount.watch(fetchUpdateAccount);accountAvatarsMount.watch(fetchAccountAvatars);accountVideoVerifyMount.watch(fetchAccountVerify);accountCouponsMount.watch(fetchAccountCoupons);
